item.title: Help with GraphicsHandler
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

I was adding in Palidino’s spechandler, and I got these 3 errors when I compiled at the end…

[code]GraphicsHandler.java:120: class, interface, or enum expected
public static void createSpec(int castId, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY,
int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int startHeight, int endHeight, int enemyY,
int enemyX, int MageAttackIndex) {
^
GraphicsHandler.java:124: class, interface, or enum expected
if(person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)
^
GraphicsHandler.java:126: class, interface, or enum expected
person.specspell(castId, casterY, casterX, offse
tY, offsetX, angle, speed, startHeight, endHeight, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackInd
ex);}

^

3 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic
